comment: Very helpful professor who cares about helping his students progress.
No comment !!! Great Professor very helpful, clear and cares about students!! take him & u would love the subject
Great professor. His lectures are very helpful. I highly recommend him.
Very helpful Professor take good notes,do the homework and the test are easy.Cares more about the students learning than grades.
Great professor!  He care more about your learning than your grades. Take good notes and study them, do the homework and the practice problems  and you'll have an A easily.

Dr. Chiou is by far the best professor I have ever had in my life. This gentleman knows his materials very well and he's very good at explaining the materials, teaches in a pretty comprehensible pace. He's very kind, caring and smart too. I wish all EE professors could learn how to be a good professor like him. TAKE HIM.
Dr. Chiou is high above everyone's expectation. He teaches very well and tries his best to let everyone pass the course. Great professor with a great personality. I will definitely take him again.
Great professor! Makes sure the students understands the material and not worried about grades. Definitely one of the best professors here at SPSU.

Dr. Chiou is an awesome professor. His exams are pretty straight forward. His notes are very helpful and clear. Tbh, I loved everything about his class and I can say I learned a lot. He is also a very friendly person and has a very interesting personality and a good sense of humor. I try to take him for all my future classes.
Professor Chiou is kind, caring, and incredibly known in the field of EE. I believe he's everything a perfect professor should be. I cannot recommend him enough. :)

Dr. Chiou is an awesome professor. He gives a very good notes with sufficient explanations. He always makes sure everyone in class understands the materials before moving to a new topic. He is also a very nice, friendly, funny and extremely helpful, knowledgeable and modest professor who only cares about students' LEARNING,not their grades!Take him
